captions.text:
My love whom I will never forget
though I hate him
You will be my first love forever

Everyday missing you
Every night I so cry
I draw you with my tears again tonight
First love.. freshness?

I think it's the love that you cried a lot for
 for the first time
Ice-cold night
It's like your heart that changed
Lonely moonlight
It's like my heart longing for you
Why did you smile so bright for me

It comes to my mind over and over again
and makes me cry

My love whom I will never forget
though I hate him
You will be my first love forever

Everyday missing you
Every night I so cry
I'm waiting for you again tonight
A fake promise of love is so short
Passing through the long dark tunnel of time

Even if I have to wait, I won't be sad
or unfortunate if you come back

The tighter I hold you
The longer I hold on to you
Just like the poison of thorns that hurt me
Love only hurts me
It's nothing but miserable thing for me
You're smiling at the thought of another love
Hope it hurts thinking of me sometimes

My love whom I will never forget
though I hate him
You will be my first love forever

Everyday missing you
Every night I so cry
I'm waiting for you again tonight

Love is just the sweet dream
that I had one night

I want to fall asleep forever
My love

I don't want to wake up
from the dream of us two
I don't want to leave your arms
My only hope is the love from you

Whatever people say
you are my only love
You used to love me
We used to be so happy

You left me like the wind
Come back to me like the wind

My love whom I will never forget
though I hate him
You will be my first love forever
Hold me in your arms again
Love me again
I'm waiting for you again tonight
